outputs.output_descr: The overall project objective is to enhance national preparedness capacities of the country for a robust and effective response to future disasters. The pattern of disasters and the type of damage it can cause (in particular when flood generated) is well known.  The 2010 Floods and the 2005 earthquake provided ample learning opportunity for assessing the country's response capacities. Based on the lessons learnt, UNDP will support effective preparation for an eventual recovery response.  Preparation activities will include the definition of implementation modalities and SOPs, partnership building, and pre-positioning of human and technical resources.

project_descr: Preparedness for Early Recovery Project to enhance institutional capacities and partnerships to effectively manage early recovery programming in response to natural disasters and other crises.
